function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of infectious diseases through video conferencing and mHealth apps","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and infection","Mitigation":"Ensuring proper screening and hygiene practices during virtual consultations, and promoting vaccination and preventive measures","Technologies":"Health monitoring apps, contact tracing apps, and telemedicine platforms","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and the general public","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, app developers, and government health agencies"},{"Description":"Data privacy and security risks with storing patient information in a Government database","Impact":"Risk of unauthorized access to sensitive health data and privacy breaches","Mitigation":"Implementing strong data encryption, secure data storage practices, and regular security audits","Technologies":"Secure database systems, encryption technologies, and cybersecurity measures","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and government authorities","Owner":"Government health agencies and data management professionals"},{"Description":"Reliance on mHealth for self-monitoring without professional medical guidance","Impact":"Risk of misinterpretation of health data and delayed or incorrect treatment","Mitigation":"Educating users about the limitations of self-monitoring, promoting regular medical check-ups, and integrating mHealth with professional healthcare services","Technologies":"Health monitoring apps with clear disclaimers and guidelines, and integrated healthcare platforms","People":"Individual users of mHealth apps and healthcare providers","Owner":"App developers, healthcare organizations, and medical professionals"}]}
